wishes.body: As a user, I want to animate elements on my slides, so that I catch the attention of my viewers.
wishes.subject: Animations

wishes.body: As a user, I want to use fragments on my slides, so that I can build the content of a slide in steps.
wishes.subject: Fragments

wishes.body: As a user, I want to use lottie animations on my slides, so that I can create more lively slides.
wishes.subject: Lottie

wishes.body: As a user, I want to use master slides, so that I can reuse a predefined layout.
wishes.subject: Master slides

wishes.body: As a user, I want to pick a theme, so that I my decks have a predefined appearance.
wishes.subject: Master slides
